testcase.name: Check login is unsuccessfull with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and apollo247 app is opened..........................passed When User navigate on landing page..........................................passed Then Fields on navigation page are visible to the user......................passed Then User clicks on login button............................................passed Then User enters contact number from sheet name "sheet1" and row number 0...passed Then User should get the invalid mobile error text on console...............passed
